alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Pike; Posey; Spencer; Vanderburgh; Warrick (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 1:03AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Warrick, northern Vanderburgh, northwestern Spencer, southeastern Gibson, east central Posey and southeastern Pike Counties through 1245 AM CDT/145 AM EDT/... At 1203 AM CDT/103 AM EDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Lynnville to near Darmstadt to near New Harmony. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Lynnville around 1215 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Chandler, Boonville, Darmstadt, Melody Hill, Dale and Folsomville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Indiana between Mile Markers 10 and 26. Interstate 64 in Indiana between Mile Markers 23 and 60. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT/500 AM EDT/ for southwestern Indiana.

area.areaDesc: Gibson; Pike; Posey; Spencer; Vanderburgh; Warrick
